sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO trade_detail ( user_id, order_no, role_id, trade_id, amount, transfer_phase, date, note, profit_type, profit_rate, repay_period_no, repay_period_count, repay_date, ext_order, actual_repay_date ) VALUES ( #userId#, #orderNo#, #roleId#, #tradeId#, #amount#, #transferPhase#, #date#, #note#, #profitType#, #profitRate#, #repayPeriodNo#, #repayPeriodCount#, #repayDate#, #extOrder#, #actualRepayDate# )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS trade_detail_id
sqlMap.select: SELECT user_base_info.account_id yjf_user_name FROM user_base_info WHERE user_base_info.user_id = #value#

SELECT t.trade_detail_id, t.user_id, t.order_no, t.role_id, u.user_base_id, u.user_name, u.real_name, t.trade_id, t.amount, t.transfer_phase, t.date, t.note, t.profit_type, t.profit_rate, t.repay_period_no, t.repay_period_count, t.repay_date, t.ext_order, actual_repay_date FROM trade_detail t
INNER JOIN role r ON t.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.user_id =t.user_id
WHERE t.transfer_phase ='original' AND t.trade_id = #tradeId#
AND r.role_code IN
#roles[]#

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(trade_detail.amount), 0) FROM trade_detail INNER JOIN role ON role.role_id = trade_detail.role_id WHERE trade_detail.user_id = #userId# AND role.role_code = #roleCode#
AND trade.trade_status IN
#statuses[]#
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM trade_detail t INNER JOIN role ON t.role_id = role.role_id WHERE t.trade_id = #tradeId# AND t.user_id = #userId# AND role.role_code = #role#

SELECT t.trade_detail_id, t.order_no, t.user_id, t.role_id, u.user_base_id, u.user_name, u.real_name, t.trade_id, t.amount, t.transfer_phase, t.date, t.note, t.profit_type, t.profit_rate, t.repay_period_no, t.repay_period_count, t.repay_date, t.ext_order, trd.trade_name, trd.trade_status, trd.demand_id, trd.trade_amount, trd.time_limit, trd.time_limit_unit, trd.loaned_amount, t.actual_repay_date, t.status FROM trade_detail t INNER JOIN trade trd on t.trade_id=trd.trade_id INNER JOIN role r ON t.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.user_id =t.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
t.trade_id = #tradeId#
t.order_no = #orderNo#
t.role_id = #roleId#
t.trade_detail_id = #detailId#
t.transfer_phase = #transferPhase#
t.status = #tradeDetailStatus#
t.user_id = #userId#
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM trade_detail t WHERE t.transfer_phase = 'original' and t.role_id = '12' AND t.trade_id = #value#

SELECT t.trade_detail_id, t.order_no, t.user_id, t.role_id, u.user_base_id, u.user_name, u.real_name, t.trade_id, t.amount, t.transfer_phase, t.date, t.note, t.profit_type, t.profit_rate, t.repay_period_no, t.repay_period_count, t.repay_date, t.ext_order, t.actual_repay_date FROM trade_detail t INNER JOIN role r ON t.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.user_id =t.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.role_id = '12' AND t.note = #value#

SELECT count(0) FROM trade_detail t INNER JOIN role r ON t.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.user_id =t.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND (t.transfer_phase = 'invest' OR t.transfer_phase = 'repay')
t.trade_id = #tradeId#
t.role_id = #roleId#
t.trade_detail_id = #detailId#
t.transfer_phase = #transferPhase#
t.user_id = #userId#
u.user_name = #userName#
u.real_name = #realName#
AND t.date >= #startDate#
AND t.date <= #endDate#
AND t.actual_repay_date <= #actualRepayDate#

SELECT t.trade_detail_id, t.order_no, t.user_id, t.role_id, u.user_base_id, u.user_name, u.real_name, t.trade_id, t.amount, t.transfer_phase, t.date, t.note, t.profit_type, t.profit_rate, t.repay_period_no, t.repay_period_count, t.repay_date, t.ext_order , t.actual_repay_date FROM trade_detail t INNER JOIN role r ON t.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.user_id =t.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND (t.transfer_phase = 'invest' OR t.transfer_phase = 'repay')
t.trade_id = #tradeId#
t.role_id = #roleId#
t.trade_detail_id = #detailId#
t.transfer_phase = #transferPhase#
t.user_id = #userId#
u.user_name = #userName#
u.real_name = #realName#
AND t.date >= #startDate#
AND t.date <= #endDate#
AND t.actual_repay_date <= #actualRepayDate#
ORDER BY t.date DESC LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize# ;

SELECT /* TRADEDETAIL-COUNTINTERESTAMOUNTBYPARAMS */ SUM(td1.`amount`) FROM trade_detail td1 INNER JOIN trade t ON t.`trade_id` = td1.`trade_id` INNER JOIN trade_detail td2 ON td1.`note`=td2.`trade_detail_id` WHERE td2.`transfer_phase` = 'original'AND td1.`role_id`='12' AND td1.profit_type='0'
td2.user_id = #userId#
t.trade_status in
#status[]#

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.amount), 0) FROM trade_detail t INNER JOIN role r ON t.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.user_id =t.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
t.trade_id = #tradeId#
t.role_id = #roleId#
t.trade_detail_id = #detailId#
t.transfer_phase = #transferPhase#
t.profit_type = #profitType#
t.user_id = #userId#
u.user_name = #userName#
u.real_name = #realName#
AND t.date >= #startDate#
AND t.date <= #endDate#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE trade_detail SET repay_date = #repayDate# WHERE trade_detail_id = #tradeDetailId#
UPDATE trade_detail SET actual_repay_date = #actualRepayDate# WHERE trade_detail_id = #tradeDetailId#
UPDATE trade_detail SET status = #status# WHERE trade_detail_id = #tradeDetailId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(0) FROM trade_detail t INNER JOIN trade trd on t.trade_id=trd.trade_id INNER JOIN role r ON t.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.user_id =t.user_id WHERE (t.transfer_phase = 'invest' OR t.transfer_phase = 'repay' OR t.transfer_phase ='original')
t.trade_id = #tradeId#
t.role_id = #roleId#
t.trade_detail_id = #detailId#
t.transfer_phase = #transferPhase#
t.user_id = #userId#
u.user_name = #userName#
u.real_name = #realName#
AND t.repay_date >= #startDate#
AND t.repay_date <= #endDate#
AND t.actual_repay_date <= #actualRepayDate#
AND trd.trade_name like '%$tradeName$%'
t.status in
#status[]#

SELECT t.trade_detail_id, t.order_no, t.user_id, t.role_id, u.user_base_id, u.user_name, u.real_name, t.trade_id, t.amount, t.transfer_phase, t.date, t.note, t.profit_type,
t.repay_period_no, t.repay_period_count,
t.ext_order , t.actual_repay_date, trd.trade_expire_date repay_date, trd.interest_rate profit_rate, trd.trade_name, trd.trade_status, trd.demand_id, trd.trade_amount, trd.loaned_amount, trd.time_limit, trd.time_limit_unit, t.actual_repay_date, t.status FROM trade_detail t INNER JOIN trade trd on t.trade_id=trd.trade_id INNER JOIN role r ON t.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.user_id =t.user_id WHERE (t.transfer_phase = 'invest' OR t.transfer_phase = 'repay' OR t.transfer_phase ='original')
t.trade_id = #tradeId#
t.role_id = #roleId#
t.trade_detail_id = #detailId#
t.transfer_phase = #transferPhase#
t.user_id = #userId#
u.user_name = #userName#
u.real_name = #realName#
AND t.repay_date >= #startDate#
AND t.repay_date <= #endDate#
AND t.actual_repay_date <= #actualRepayDate#
t.status in
#status[]#
trd.trade_status in
#tradeStatusList[]#
AND trd.trade_name like '%$tradeName$%'
AND trd.trade_status = #tradeStatus#
ORDER BY t.date DESC
LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize# ;

SELECT t.trade_detail_id, t.order_no, t.user_id, t.role_id, t.trade_id, t.amount, t.transfer_phase, t.date, t.note, t.profit_type, t.profit_rate, t.repay_period_no, t.repay_period_count, t.repay_date, t.ext_order, t.actual_repay_date FROM trade_detail t WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.trade_detail_id = #value#
